name: Hero's Hooves
description:
A short platformer made in a week for a Bored Pixels Jam 8 with a funny twist: Instead of playing as the hero you control the hero's horse! 
The Game has two levels each with some interesting rooms.

Controls:

W/D or Left/Right - Move,

R - Drop The Knight,

E - Pick Up The Knight,

Space - Jump,

Tips:

! - Only Knight can open locks,

! - Drop The Knight to make double-jumps,

! - The longer you hold space the higher you jump, sometimes you just have to tap it.

If you liked the pixel art you can buy the tileset and a few assets from the game here:

https://sticzi.itch.io/platformer-tileset
